paper_abstract: New Runge-Kutta-Nystrom methods especially designed for the numerical integration of periodic initial value problems are presented in this paper. They are able to integrate exactly the harmonic oscillator. Here we analyze the construction of an embedded 5(3) RKN pair with four stages. Numerical experiments indicate that the new pair is more efficient than some previously derived RKN pairs. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A 5(3) pair of explicit Runge-Kutta-Nystrom methods for oscillatory problems
